steam_set_achievement: With this function you can tell the Steam API to award ("set") an achievement for the player. These achievements should have been defined on the Steamworks control panel accounts page for your game and the string that is passed to the function should match that used as the API Name on the control panel. The Steam Game Overlay will display a notification panel to the user informing them of the achievement that they have received, unless the achievement has already been awarded, in which case nothing will happen.
